objects.query: SELECT Id, Name FROM Account WHERE Name = 'Account Template (DO NOT USE)'
SELECT Id, Name, IsActive FROM Product2 WHERE Name = 'Product Template'

SELECT Id, Name, Pricebook2Id, Product2Id, UnitPrice, UseStandardPrice, IsActive FROM PricebookEntry WHERE Product2.Name = 'Product Template' AND Pricebook2.Name = 'Standard Price Book' AND Pricebook2.IsStandard = true

SELECT Id, Name, AccountId, Pricebook2Id, StartDate, EndDate FROM ServiceContract WHERE Name = 'Otis Installation Service Contract Template for <Company Name>' AND Account.Name = 'Account Template (DO NOT USE)'

SELECT Id, Name__c, PricebookEntryId, Quantity, Type__c, ServiceContractId, UnitPrice FROM ContractLineItem WHERE ServiceContract.Name = 'Otis Installation Service Contract Template for <Company Name>' AND ServiceContract.Account.Name = 'Account Template (DO NOT USE)'
